text: Syed Jahangir (2 January 1935 – 29 December 2018) was a Bangladeshi painter. He painted for over 55 years including 9000 oils, watercolors and mixed medias. Through his career, Jahangir has held 35 solo and 1 group exhibition.Solo Painting Exhibition of River and Earth, Bengal Gallery of Fine Arts, 27 November 2007 Jahangir died on 29 December 2018 at the age of 83. ==জাহাঙ্গীর== ==Other websites== *www.syedjahangir.com Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Bangladeshi painters Category:People from Khulna Division
title: Syed Jahangir
